item.sextant.tooltip.instructions.insert: Insert items from the first slot  by right-clicking while sneaking.
item.sextant.tooltip.instructions.output: Output items from the sextant by right-clicking while sneaking.
config.sextant.client.angleUnit.desc: The unit that is used for angles
The amount of degrees that determines how close your rotation needs to be to a cardinal direction for the camera to snap to it if a compass is equipped in the sextant
config.sextant.client.snappingThresholdS: The same as snapping threshold but when a spyglass is equipped in the sextant
